clinical_study.brief_title: Study for Evaluating the Efficacy of Ciprofol in Patients Under Narcotic Sleep With Chronic Insomnia
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Center, Randomized, Single Blind, Exploratory Study for Evaluating the Efficacy of Ciprofol in Patients Under Narcotic Sleep With Chronic Insomnia

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single center, randomized, single blind, exploratory clinical study.About 30 patients with chronic insomnia are planned to be enrolled in this study and randomized into two groups by a ratio of 4:1 (Figure 1), with group 1 (24 subjects) for ciprofol and group 2 (6 subjects) for placebo (fat emulsion). Cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) will be given to these patients during the treatment.

intervention.description: intravenous infusion of ciprofol at 0.12 mg/kg, followed by 0.4-1.6 mg/kg/h for maintenance
at the infusion rate of 25-30 mL/h
